title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1102/96 of 19 June 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 1474/95 and fixing the quantities available for the applications submitted from 15 May 1996
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1102/96 of 19 June 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 1474/95 and fixing the quantities available for the applications submitted from 15 May 1996
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Regulation (EC) No 1474/95 is replaced by Annex I to this Regulation.
The quantities available for the applications lodged from 15 to 24 May 1996 shall be those laid down in Annex II to this Regulation.
The licences issued for the applications referred to in Article 2 shall be valid until 31 August 1996.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 15 May 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 June 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) See page 1 of this Official Journal.
